nodes.text: The Mystral Minstrels were a musical group whose work was considered melodious. Their music was available in the galaxy during the period that the droid Master-Com was administrator of the space station known as The Wheel. While Master-Com was administrator, he came to be considered a connoisseur of music, including those songs produced by the Minstrels.

The Mystral Minstrels were first mentioned in the second entry of Viva Space Vegas! The History of the Marvelous Wheel, a pair of articles released in 2013 on the StarWars.com blog and written by Abel G. Peña and Rich Handley.
